== Accounts Manager ==

This web page is where we are coordinating the work to build a '''Accounts Management''' application for the Ubuntu Phone that could also extend to other form factors too with the responsive design features built into the <nowiki>[[http://developer.ubuntu.com/get-started/gomobile/|Ubuntu SDK]]</nowiki>
